dialog.text: Woo-hoo new project!  Hopefully it won't be the complete mess the first one was :smiley:  How was your weekend?

I had Sunday off, and got to do some gaming with Pete.  Got a call from Rachel, a friend who's doing a computing course in Edinburgh.  She is soooo bored! She has like 300 people in her lectures and she has to do loads of Maths.  I was looking at going to Herriot-Watt but this course seemed more industry focused and I get to do it from my bed :smiley:  What are you like at Maths?

joins.text: Lucky you.  I am hopeless - hated it at school.
Same here, I am hopeless - hated it at school.

dialog.text: I guess we will have do some later on, but really hoping its not much.  Is that the time - got to run!
